content: So good!

Very helpful to put pictures or images on Home screen (as contrasted with background wallpaper or Lock screen), but after system update or restart, I have to delete the widget and then re-select the photos. This should persist through restarts.
replyContent: After reboot, please be patient while the widgets loading. It takes some time. If after few minutes widgets still doesn't appear, probably your device disabled auto start option/optimized battery usage for this app. Please change it in the device settings.

perhaps I misunderstood, does this app only show one photo and does not rotate through a folder?
replyContent: Thanks for purchasing my app. This photo widget does not automatic change photos. The reason it designed this way is to save battery and reduce phone lagging. You can copy or move images into one folder so you can switch them easily in few clicks.
